00027 ATTRIBUTE_ALIGNED16(class) btCollisionShape
00028 {
00029 protected:
00030         int m_shapeType;
00031         void* m_userPointer;
00032         int m_userIndex;
00033 
00034 public:
00035 
00036         BT_DECLARE_ALIGNED_ALLOCATOR();
00037 
00038         btCollisionShape() : m_shapeType (INVALID_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE), m_userPointer(0), m_userIndex(-1)
00039         {
00040         }
00041 
00042         virtual ~btCollisionShape()
00043         {
00044         }
00045 
00047         virtual void getAabb(const btTransform& t,btVector3& aabbMin,btVector3& aabbMax) const =0;
00048 
00049         virtual void    getBoundingSphere(btVector3& center,btScalar& radius) const;
00050 
00052         virtual btScalar        getAngularMotionDisc() const;
00053 
00054         virtual btScalar        getContactBreakingThreshold(btScalar defaultContactThresholdFactor) const;
00055 
00056 
00059         void calculateTemporalAabb(const btTransform& curTrans,const btVector3& linvel,const btVector3& angvel,btScalar timeStep, btVector3& temporalAabbMin,btVector3& temporalAabbMax) const;
00060 
00061 
00062 
00063         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE bool  isPolyhedral() const
00064         {
00065                 return btBroadphaseProxy::isPolyhedral(getShapeType());
00066         }
00067 
00068         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE bool  isConvex2d() const
00069         {
00070                 return btBroadphaseProxy::isConvex2d(getShapeType());
00071         }
00072 
00073         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE bool  isConvex() const
00074         {
00075                 return btBroadphaseProxy::isConvex(getShapeType());
00076         }
00077         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE bool  isNonMoving() const
00078         {
00079                 return btBroadphaseProxy::isNonMoving(getShapeType());
00080         }
00081         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE bool  isConcave() const
00082         {
00083                 return btBroadphaseProxy::isConcave(getShapeType());
00084         }
00085         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE bool  isCompound() const
00086         {
00087                 return btBroadphaseProxy::isCompound(getShapeType());
00088         }
00089 
00090         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE bool  isSoftBody() const
00091         {
00092                 return btBroadphaseProxy::isSoftBody(getShapeType());
00093         }
00094 
00096         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE bool isInfinite() const
00097         {
00098                 return btBroadphaseProxy::isInfinite(getShapeType());
00099         }
00100 
00101 #ifndef __SPU__
00102         virtual void    setLocalScaling(const btVector3& scaling) =0;
00103         virtual const btVector3& getLocalScaling() const =0;
00104         virtual void    calculateLocalInertia(btScalar mass,btVector3& inertia) const = 0;
00105 
00106 
00107 //debugging support
00108         virtual const char*     getName()const =0 ;
00109 #endif //__SPU__
00110 
00111         
00112         int             getShapeType() const { return m_shapeType; }
00113 
00116         virtual btVector3       getAnisotropicRollingFrictionDirection() const
00117         {
00118                 return btVector3(1,1,1);
00119         }
00120         virtual void    setMargin(btScalar margin) = 0;
00121         virtual btScalar        getMargin() const = 0;
00122 
00123         
00125         void    setUserPointer(void*  userPtr)
00126         {
00127                 m_userPointer = userPtr;
00128         }
00129 
00130         void*   getUserPointer() const
00131         {
00132                 return m_userPointer;
00133         }

00135         {
00136                 m_userIndex = index;
00137         }
00138 
00139         int getUserIndex() const
00140         {
00141                 return m_userIndex;
00142         }
00143 
00144 
00145         virtual int     calculateSerializeBufferSize() const;
00146

00149 
00150         virtual void    serializeSingleShape(btSerializer* serializer) const;

00152 };

00155 struct  btCollisionShapeData
00156 {
00157         char    *m_name;
00158         int             m_shapeType;
00159         char    m_padding[4];
00160 };

00162 SIMD_FORCE_INLINE       int     btCollisionShape::calculateSerializeBufferSize() const
00163 {
00164         return sizeof(btCollisionShapeData);
00165 }
